title: WSB's The Weekend Bite: Investors Should Be Raising Cash, And 3 New Additions To The S&P
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we're bringing you a Quant check on 3 new companies entering the S&P, and we sit down with George Ball, Chairman at Sanders Morris Harris, to discuss why he says investors should still be raising cash.
content:encoded: This week we're bringing you a Quant check on 3 new companies entering the S&P, and we sit down with George Ball, Chairman at Sanders Morris Harris, to discuss why he says investors should still be raising cash.
